WIRE.name: Cable
WIRE.tooltip: An adjustable hardware to hardware wire

DOUBLESANDCRAB.name: Double WAGO
DOUBLESANDCRAB.tooltip: A connector that connects two wires together

TRIPLESANDCRAB.name: Triple WAGO
TRIPLESANDCRAB.tooltip: A connector with 1 input and 2 outputs

BATTERY.name: Battery
BATTERY.tooltip: A 12 Volt battery to power the circuit

DOUBLESOLENOID.name: Double Solenoid
DOUBLESOLENOID.tooltip: Electronic air control for two pistons

SINGLESOLENOID.name: Single Solenoid
SINGLESOLENOID.tooltip: lectronic air control for one piston

PDP.name: PDP
PDP.tooltip: Power Distribution Panel to distribute power to various components

VRM.name: VRM
VRM.tooltip: Voltage Regulation Module to adjust voltage

ROBORIO.name: roboRIO
ROBORIO.tooltip: roboRIO Advanced Robotics Controller, the onboard computer

TALON.name: Talon
TALON.tooltip: Talon SRX Smart Motor Controller, controls 775 motors

PCM.name: PCM
PCM.tooltip: Pneumatics Control Module, controls pneumatics components

SPARK.name: SPARK MAX
SPARK.tooltip: SPARK MAX Motor Controller, controls NEO motors

NEO.name: NEO
NEO.tooltip: NEO Brushless Motor, uses SPARK MAX controllers

BREAKER.name: Breaker
BREAKER.tooltip: Main Circuit Breaker to cut the power

RADIO.name: Radio
RADIO.tooltip: Radio to communicate with the driver

EPLATE.name: E-Plate
EPLATE.tooltip: Electronics Plate to hold hardware in place

PRESSURESWITCH.name: Pressure Switch
PRESSURESWITCH.tooltip: Pneumatics pressure switch to adjust air pressure

PISTON.name: Piston
PISTON.tooltip: Pneumatics piston moved with pressured air

MANIFOLD.name: Manifold
MANIFOLD.tooltip: Pneumatics manifold to distribute air across multiple components

TANK.name: Tank
TANK.tooltip: Pneumatics tank to hold pressured air

COMPRESSOR.name: Compressor
COMPRESSOR.tooltip: Pneumatics compressor to increase air pressure
